name: Volleyball Simulator
description:
Volleyball Simulator is a lighthearted strategy game that simulates the strategic elements of 6 on 6 indoor volleyball. 

Game features:

  • Control your teams movements and positions around the court on serve receive, defense and offence 
  • Choose service and attack locations for each of your teams contacts. Line up your shots accurately to avoid the block and land the kill.
  • Stack up your block and defense for a chance at slam blocks or amazing digs
  • Select from seven difficulty levels ranging from "So Incredibly Easy" to "Impossible"

Created by Yes Guy Gaming creator Garrett May and game developer Tobias Bauer.
